TalentView install and setup

Set up you developer environment!

Databases

Two types of databases are used in TalentView:

  • A SQL database for companies, users, campaigns, candidacies,…
  • A NoSQL database for messages, comments,…

PostgreSQL

Install PostgreSQL:

brew install postgresql

Also install the PostgreSQL app.

Mongo

Install Mongo:

brew tap mongodb/brew
brew install mongodb-community@4.4

View the services list:

brew services list

Start the service:

brew services start mongodb-community@4.4
